title: Junior Software Test Engineer
description:
**Overview**
 We are looking for a
 **Junior Software Test Engineer** 
 to join our QA team. This role is ideal for
 **fresh graduates** 
 who are keen to build a career in software testing and quality assurance. The candidate will work closely with developers, senior testers, and product teams to ensure our applications are reliable, user\\-friendly, and meet quality standards.
   

  

**Roles \\& Responsibilities**
* Understand product requirements, user flows, and functional specifications.
* Execute manual test cases for web and/or mobile applications.
* Identify, log, and track bugs using bug\\-tracking tools.
* Perform smoke, sanity, functional, and regression testing.
* Re\\-test defects after fixes and validate outcomes.
* Assist in preparing test cases, test scenarios, and basic test reports.
* Collaborate with developers to clearly explain issues and reproduction steps.
* Follow QA processes, documentation standards, and timelines.
* Support senior QA engineers in test execution and release validation.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field.
* Basic understanding of software testing concepts and SDLC/STLC.
* Knowledge of manual testing techniques and test case writing.
* Familiarity with web applications and browsers.
* Basic understanding of databases and SQL is a plus.
* Awareness of bug life cycle and defect tracking tools (JIRA/Bugzilla ‚Äì preferred).
* Good analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Strong attention to detail and eagerness to learn.
* Good verbal and written communication skills

title: React Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Some careers shine brighter than others.
   

  

 If you're looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.
   

  

 HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.
   

  

 We are committed to delivering innovative financial solutions and exceptional customer service, supported by a global network and a team of dedicated professionals. Our core values of integrity, sustainability, and inclusiveness drive us to create a positive impact in the communities we serve.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Senior Software Engineer. In this position, you will be instrumental in developing and enhancing our web\\-based applications, ensuring they are robust, efficient, and user\\-friendly. Your expertise will contribute to creating modern, highly responsive user interfaces that meet the evolving needs of our clients and stakeholders.
   

  

 This role involves translating complex designs and wireframes into high\\-quality, scalable code, primarily using React.js. You will be responsible for designing reusable components and front\\-end libraries, optimizing application performance across various devices and browsers, and ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices. Collaboration with cross\\-functional teams will be essential to coordinate development efforts, conduct system testing, and support system implementation processes.
   

  

 Additionally, you will prepare comprehensive project documentation, ensure compliance with audit policies, and work proactively to reduce technical risks. Providing technical guidance, knowledge transfer, and mentorship to team members will be key to fostering a productive and innovative work environment. Your contributions will directly impact the quality, efficiency, and security of our software solutions, enabling HSBC to maintain its leadership in the financial services industry.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a university degree in computer science or a related discipline, with proven hands\\-on experience in front\\-end development, particularly with React.js. You should have a thorough understanding of React.js core principles, Redux, and modern JavaScript features, including EcmaScript standards. Experience with test\\-driven development and familiarity with common front\\-end tools such as Babel, Webpack, and NPM are essential.
   

  

 You should have strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience in connecting to REST APIs and handling errors efficiently. Knowledge of popular libraries like Bootstrap, Material UI, and Lodash will be advantageous. Additionally, experience in converting UX wireframes into responsive, intuitive interfaces, along with browser debugging and performance testing skills, is required.
   

  

 Familiarity with accessibility testing, keyboard\\-driven development, and automation testing tools will be considered a plus. Knowledge of cloud platforms, banking IT environments, and tools such as Git, JIRA, SonarQube, Jenkins, and Postman will further strengthen your application. Excellent communication and documentation skills are vital for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop new user\\-facing features using React.js to create engaging and responsive web applications.
* Design and implement modern UI components that are scalable, reusable, and maintainable.
* Translate wireframes and visual designs into high\\-quality, functional code ensuring cross\\-browser compatibility.
* Optimize application performance for a wide range of devices and browsers, ensuring a seamless user experience.
* Collaborate with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs and ensure data consistency and error handling.
* Conduct system and user acceptance testing to validate functionality and performance standards.
* Maintain comprehensive project documentation, ensuring compliance with company policies and audit requirements.
* Identify and mitigate technical risks, reducing technical debt through best practices and code reviews.
* Provide technical guidance, mentorship, and knowledge sharing within the development team.
* Participate in continuous improvement initiatives, including automation, tooling, and process enhancements.


**Benefits**
 HSBC offers a competitive benefits package designed to support your personal and professional growth. Employees enjoy comprehensive health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off. We also promote work\\-life balance through flexible working arrangements and encourage ongoing learning through training programs and development opportunities.
   

  

 As part of our team, you will have access to a collaborative and inclusive work environment that values diversity and innovation. HSBC is committed to fostering a culture of continuous improvement, where your contributions are recognized and rewarded. We also provide various wellness initiatives and employee engagement activities to promote a healthy and dynamic workplace.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 HSBC is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees are valued, respected, and have equal access to opportunities. We do not discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. Our diversity and inclusion initiatives aim to foster a workplace that reflects the communities we serve and supports the growth and development of all our employees.

title: Full Stack Development Internship in Gurgaon
description:
As a Full Stack Development intern at MyCleaners, you will have the opportunity to utilize your skills in HTML, PHP, and Python to help revolutionize the cleaning industry. With our innovative technology, you will work alongside our experienced team to design, implement, and maintain dynamic web applications that will enhance the overall user experience.
   

  

* Develop and maintain responsive web applications using HTML, PHP, and Python.
* Collaborate with the design team to create user\\-friendly interfaces.
* Implement new features and functionalities to improve the overall customer experience.
* Conduct thorough testing to ensure the quality and efficiency of the web applications.
* Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues that may arise.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date on the latest trends and technologies in web development.
* Assist in brainstorming and implementing new ideas to drive business growth and success.


 Join us at MyCleaners and gain valuable hands\\-on experience while making a meaningful impact in the digital world of cleaning services.
   

  

 About Company: In this fast\\-paced world where technology is scripting history and revolution in varied genres of life, MyCleaners is at your doorstep to provide you with the top quality services, combining the newest in the field with eco\\-friendly equipment.
   

  

 Our new product is a perfect blend of technology that is prepped to deal with the challenges of changing times and also to be your loyal and earnest buddy in laundry work. We merely aren't just a laundry service company but also an employee\\-centric, user\\-friendly organization that works with integrity, honesty, and for whom customer satisfaction is the biggest applause and appraisal.

title: Staff Engineer (NodeJS)
description:
**Company Description**
 üëãüèºWe're Nagarro, we are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (17500\\+ experts across 36 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non\\-hierarchical. We are looking for great new colleagues. That is where you come in!
   

  

**Job Description**
**REQUIREMENTS:**
* Experience : 6\\+ Years
* Must have experience on Nodejs, Typescript, Microservices, Express, JavaScript
* Must have experience in Kafka or any other messaging queue
* Should have experience in Unit testing.
* Any two or more skillsets \\- Jenkins, Bamboo, Docker, Kubernetes, Circle CI, Octopus
* Design, develop, and deploy RESTful APIs using AWS services, focusing on Lambdas, S3, ALB, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.
* Utilize scripting languages to enhance application functionality and customize solutions to meet specific requirements.
* Collaborate closely with onshore engineers to facilitate effective cross\\-team discussions and goal alignment.
* Write clean, maintainable code that adheres to industry best practices and coding standards.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues to ensure the seamless operation of APIs and related services.
* Conduct thorough code reviews and provide constructive feedback to fellow team members.
* Participate in architectural discussions, contributing innovative ideas to optimize scalability, reliability, and performance.
* Stay up to date with advancements in AWS services, scripting languages, and software engineering trends.


**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
* Writing and reviewing great quality code
* Understanding the client‚Äôs business use cases and technical requirements and be able to convert them into technical design which elegantly meets the requirements.
* Mapping decisions with requirements and be able to translate the same to developers.
* Identifying different solutions and being able to narrow down the best option that meets the client‚Äôs requirements.
* Defining guidelines and benchmarks for NFR considerations during project implementation
* Writing and reviewing design document explaining overall architecture, framework, and high\\-level design of the application for the developers
* Reviewing architecture and design on various aspects like extensibility, scalability, security, design patterns, user experience, NFRs, etc., and ensure that all relevant best practices are followed.
* Developing and designing the overall solution for defined functional and non\\-functional requirements; and defining technologies, patterns, and frameworks to materialize it
* Understanding and relating technology integration scenarios and applying these learnings in projects
* Resolving issues that are raised during code/review, through exhaustive systematic analysis of the root cause, and being able to justify the decision taken.
* Carrying out POCs to make sure that suggested design/technologies meet the requirements.


**Qualifications**
 Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Quantum TechWorks Private Limited is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering innovative and reliable software solutions to clients across various industries. Our company specializes in developing scalable web and mobile applications, integrating cutting\\-edge technologies to meet the dynamic needs of our customers. With a focus on quality, agility, and customer satisfaction, Quantum TechWorks has established itself as a trusted partner for digital transformation initiatives. Our team comprises talented professionals committed to pushing the boundaries of technology and delivering excellence in every project.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled Full\\-Stack Developer with 5\\+ years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high\\-performance, scalable web applications that meet the evolving needs of our clients. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on complex systems, utilizing modern frameworks and technologies to create seamless user experiences and robust backend solutions. The candidate must be comfortable working in a fast\\-paced environment, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and contributing to all phases of the software development lifecycle.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a strong technical background with the following qualifications:
   

  

* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in full\\-stack development.
* Proficiency in Java with Spring / Spring Boot Framework.
* Hands\\-on experience with Kafka Framework for event\\-driven and messaging systems.
* Strong frontend development skills using React JS.
* Experience working with SQL databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or similar.
* Knowledge of NoSQL databases, specifically MongoDB.
* Expertise in designing and integrating RESTful APIs.
* Solid understanding of system design principles and scalable architectures.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.


**Responsibilities**
 The successful candidate will be responsible for:
   

  

* Developing and maintaining scalable web applications that meet business requirements.
* Designing, developing, and optimizing REST APIs for seamless integration.
* Integrating React JS front\\-end with backend services to deliver a cohesive user experience.
* Working with Kafka for asynchronous processing, messaging, and event\\-driven architecture.
* Collaborating with product managers, designers, and other developers to deliver high\\-quality solutions.
* Participating in code reviews, testing, and deployment activities to ensure code quality and performance.
* Staying updated with the latest industry trends and incorporating best practices into development processes.


**Benefits**
 Quantum TechWorks Private Limited offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees‚Äô well\\-being and professional growth. Employees enjoy competitive salary packages, health insurance, and paid time off. We also promote a collaborative work environment, opportunities for skill development, and participation in cutting\\-edge projects. Our company values work\\-life balance and provides flexible work arrangements where possible, fostering a positive and productive workplace culture.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Quantum TechWorks Private Limited is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe in providing equal employment opportunities and fostering a culture of respect, fairness, and integrity.

title: Content Optimization Engineer
description:
**About Coursera**
 Coursera was founded in 2012 by Stanford professors Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller to make world\\-class learning accessible to everyone, everywhere. Today, over 190 million learners and 375\\+ university and industry partners use our platform to gain skills in fields like AI, data science, technology, and business. As a Delaware public benefit corporation and Certified B Corp, we‚Äôre driven by the belief that learning can transform lives through learning.
   

  

**Why Join Us**
 At Coursera, we‚Äôre looking for inventors, innovators, and lifelong learners ready to shape the future of education. You‚Äôll help build global programs and tools that power online learning for millions turning bold ideas into real impact. People who thrive here are customer\\-first builders who move fast, simplify ruthlessly, and iterate relentlessly on the metrics that matter.
   

  

 We‚Äôre a globally distributed team and let you choose the best way you work, whether it's from home, a Coursera hub, or a co\\-working space near you. Our virtual hiring and onboarding make it easy to join us and start making an impact from anywhere. If you‚Äôre ready to make a global impact, scale unique products exclusive to Coursera, and expand your career horizons, apply below.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 The Content Optimization Engineer, Hands\\-On Learning, is a full\\-time position focused on optimizing and enhancing the quality of technical course content within the Computer Science, Data Science, IT, AI, and Engineering domains. This role is dedicated to improving learner engagement, satisfaction, and retention by refining course content and guiding strategies and new experimentation for hands\\-on learning experiences. The role‚Äôs mission is to help increase access to high\\-quality and industry\\-relevant hands\\-on learning experiences that help learners master the technical skills they need to reach their career and learning goals.
   

  

 We‚Äôre looking for a Contract Solutions Engineer who will work alongside Coursera‚Äôs Solutions Engineers and university and faculty Subject Matter Experts to build virtual learning labs and autograders on our advanced technical platform features. The Software Engineer should have experience working and consulting with STEM subject\\-matter experts, and be comfortable building basic Docker container\\-based applications. This role will support partners producing Computer Science, Data Science, and Engineering domains, where a STEM background (whether through formal education or relevant industry experience) is required.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Lead Technical Optimisation Implementation: Collaborate with internal teams, data scientists, product, and industry Subject Matter Experts to develop, prioritize, and manage technical and hands\\-on learning course optimisation opportunities and resourcing required.
* Technical Build \\& Optimization of Hands\\-On Learning Environments: Edit, create, and refine identified virtual learning environments, including labs, autograders, code blocks, Coach, and AI Grading opportunities based on learner feedback and data. Customize and maintain Docker container\\-based applications to support various technical learning environments and troubleshooting as needed.
* Monitor Success Metrics of Optimizations: Utilize data analysis and course metrics to track the success of technical content optimizations over time. Your shared goal will be to positively impact learner engagement, retention, and skill development metrics through optimization updates.
* Map Technical Optimization Challenges to Platform Solutions: Onboard to Coursera‚Äôs hands\\-on learning feature set, including Labs, Programming Assignments, Code Blocks, Coach, and AI Grading features. Use this knowledge to help consult on and brainstorm effective, efficient, and creative platform solutions for optimization opportunities and leverage.
* Implement partner feedback through Agile Development processes: Use an agile development framework and predefined sprint timelines to meet delivery milestones and incorporate learner feedback to final high\\-quality standards
* Conduct quality assurance on optimizations based on predefined checklists: Conduct quality assurance and end\\-to\\-end testing to ensure updated technical content meets predefined standards and best practices and is launch\\-ready.
* Document your code: Utilize industry best practices to document code, ensuring easy maintenance and hand\\-off for continued content optimization.
* Communicate \\& Document Product Enhancements \\& Feedback: Document and communicate product enhancements that could improve the technical build and learning experience to our product and engineering teams


**Qualifications**
**Skills Required for this position:**
* Technical consulting, Product knowledge; Communication; Relationship \\& influence; Customer empathy; Time Management; Ability to give/take constructive feedback; Teamwork


**Basic Qualifications:**
* 3\\+ years of professional experience, including at 2\\+ years of technical experience
* HTML, CSS, JavaScript and programming proficiency in Python or another programming language, comfort with CLI tools
* Demonstrated experience in debugging and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to pick up new languages and frameworks quickly
* Proficiency with Generative AI tools, Agents, and Prompt Engineering
* Data\\-driven and proficient in basic data analysis
* Demonstrated ability to build strong rapport with internal and external stakeholders
* Knowledge of software build, testing, and versioning best practices (Github and Version Control tools)
* Experience with Docker
* Experience with the following IDES: Jupyter Notebooks, RStudio, Visual Studio Code, Eclipse, Intellij
* Strong bias for action and ability to manage numerous projects and schedules simultaneously in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Strong business acumen and consulting experience to effectively translate learning objectives into practical course enhancements.


**Preferred Qualifications:**
* Experience with Test Driven Development (TDD) and related methodologies.
* Knowledge and experience in pedagogical principles and patterns to guide the creation of effective learning experiences.


 Coursera is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to building a welcoming and inclusive workplace. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to legally protected characteristics and provide reasonable accommodations upon request at accommodations@coursera.org. Learn more in our CCPA Applicant Notice and GDPR Recruitment Notice.

title: Front End Development Internship in Mumbai (Hybrid)
description:
Company: Evolusis
   

  

 Work Style: Hybrid
   

  

 Experience: Freshers \\& early professionals (0‚Äì2 years)
   

  

 Compensation: ‚Çπ10,000 per month for the first two months with subsequent pay structured as per industry norms
   

  

 ‚∏ª
   

  

**Company Description**
 Evolusis blends psychology, communication science, and AI to build intelligent, human\\-like conversational experiences.
   

  

 Our platforms and tools are designed to feel intuitive, human, and seamless. Front\\-end development at Evolusis goes beyond visuals ‚Äî it‚Äôs about crafting interfaces that support behaviour change, learning journeys, and meaningful user interactions.
   

  

 In this role, you‚Äôll help bring research\\-backed ideas to life through clean, responsive, and user\\-friendly web interfaces.
   

  

 ‚∏ª
   

  

 Role Description
   

  

 We‚Äôre looking for a Front\\-End Developer who is passionate about building intuitive user interfaces and translating product ideas into smooth, functional experiences.
   

  

 Your role involves developing and maintaining front\\-end components, collaborating with designers and backend teams, and ensuring that our platforms are visually consistent, responsive, and user\\-centric.
   

  

 This role is ideal for early\\-career developers who enjoy design\\-to\\-code work, care about user experience, and want to grow in a product\\-driven environment.
   

  

 The initial two months will be an internship period after which high performers will be offered a Pre\\-Placement Offer (PPO) with a competitive compensation package aligned with industry standards.
   

  

 ‚∏ª
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 Front\\-End Development
   

  

* Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Develop reusable components and front\\-end features
* Ensure cross\\-browser and cross\\-device compatibility
* Optimize applications for performance and scalability


 UI Implementation \\& UX Support
   

  

* Convert design mockups (Figma/Canva) into functional interfaces
* Maintain visual consistency across platforms
* Implement animations, transitions, and micro\\-interactions where needed
* Ensure accessibility and usability best practices


 Collaboration \\& Integration
   

  

* Work closely with designers, backend developers, and product teams
* Integrate APIs and backend services into the front end
* Participate in reviews, testing, and iteration cycles
* Debug and fix UI\\-related issues


 Documentation \\& Code Quality
   

  

* Write clean, readable, and well\\-documented code
* Maintain component libraries and style guides
* Follow best practices for version control and collaboration
* Assist in improving front\\-end workflows and standards


 ‚∏ª
   

  

 You‚Äôre a Great Fit If You‚Ä¶
   

  

* Have a foundation in front\\-end development (self\\-taught or degree\\-based)
* Enjoy turning designs into real, interactive products
* Care about user experience and visual clarity
* Like writing clean, structured, maintainable code
* Are curious, detail\\-oriented, and eager to learn
* Can collaborate well with cross\\-functional teams
* Enjoy building products with real\\-world impact


 ‚∏ª
   

  

**Skills Required**
 Must\\-Have
   

  

* Strong fundamentals in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Understanding of responsive design principles
* Familiarity with version control (Git/GitHub)
* Ability to implement designs accurately


 Good to Have
   

  

* Experience with React / Vue / similar frameworks
* Basic understanding of APIs and backend integration
* Knowledge of accessibility and performance optimization
* Familiarity with Figma or design tools
* Exposure to Tailwind, Bootstrap, or modern CSS frameworks


 ‚∏ª
   

  

 What You‚Äôll Gain
   

  

* Hands\\-on experience building real\\-world web products
* Opportunity to work on user\\-facing platforms from scratch
* Exposure to product thinking and design collaboration
* A portfolio of front\\-end projects and components
* Mentorship from product, design, and engineering teams
* Letter of recommendation \\+ certificate
* Potential PPO for exceptional performers

title: Practo - Senior Software Engineer - React.js Framework
description:
**Description**
**Job Description :**
**About Practo**
 Practo is the world's leading healthcare platform that connects millions of patients with hundreds of thousands of healthcare providers around the world and helps people make better healthcare decisions.
   

  

 Practo provides a singular platform that helps consumers with all their healthcare requirements from finding the healthcare provider to booking an appointment, to online doctor consultation, to getting their tests done and to even ordering medicines.
   

  

 Practo also makes software products that help healthcare providers ranging from clinics to hospitals digitize and deliver more efficient and higher quality healthcare to millions of patients around the world every day. Practo continues to be dedicated to centering healthcare around the consumer and helping billions of people live healthier longer lives.
   

  

**Role Overview**

* Design and develop responsive, scalable user interfaces using React and Node.js.

* Mentor team members and foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.

**Requirements**

* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and related web technologies.
* Expertise in modern UI frameworks/libraries (e.g., Redux, React Router, Material\\-UI).

title: Chai Point - Backend Software Engineer - Java
description:
Job Title : Software Engineer Backend
   

  

 Department : Technology
   

  

 Location : Bangalore
   

  

**About Chai Point**
 The worlds largest Chai\\-led beverage platform, Chai Point, is an omni channel brand that started in 2011\\.
   

  

 The Company reaches millions of customers every day through multiple touch points including retail stores, cloud kitchens, corporate offices and institutions, consumer packaged goods, and HORECA (hotels, restaurants, and QSRs).
   

  

 myChai Brewing Bots system is a proprietary Cloud\\-connected Chai and coffee brewing technology platform that gives Chai Point the capability to brew fresh chai and coffee with consistent quality on a global scale.
   

  

 Chai Point is present in India through its retail network of over 180 stores across 9 major cities and in over 3500 workplace community hubs across 119 cities through its specialised brewing systems.
   

  

 With single origin tea from Assams finest estates and 100% single origin Arabica coffee beans from Rainforest Alliance certified estates of Chikmagalur, Karnataka, Chai Point is already serving over 700,000 cups every day.
   

  

 Chai Point is the first company in India to launch environment\\-friendly heat retaining Chai flasks in 2016 that can keep the chai, coffee hot for up to 2 hours.
   

  

 Chai Point is backed by marquee investors like Eight Roads Ventures (part of Fidelity Investments Inc.), Saama Capital, DSG, Paragon Partners and Kitara Capital.
   

  

 The Company has raised over $50 million in funds till date.
   

  

**Company Culture**
 We are driven by our brand purpose Serve a great cup that brightens lives and brings people together.
   

  

 As a beverage platform, we have a strong bias for technology.
   

  

 We live with a sports credo.
   

  

 We are here to win and that happens when teams perform well.
   

  

 Collaborative mindset, happy positive attitude and an analytical mindset does wonders for us.
   

  

 Smart but acidic; Performer but a loner ; Great pedigree but disdainful of a collaborative mindset these are all strict NO for us.
   

  

 We are Passionate \\& we Innovate every day; we believe in being Detail Oriented as the difference between mediocrity \\& excellence is in the attention to details.
   

  

 We are Happy Positive \\& move forward with a happy spirit and believe that solutions are easier to find when you have a smile on, Team Orientation \\& Ownership are qualities that have got us this far and will lead the way in making us the most lovable brand, if you think you resonate with what you just read.
   

  

 We are an ideal match!!
   

  

 Chai Point has taken a leadership role in its commitment to social responsibility.
   

  

 Our priority was and is to move towards 100% plastic\\-free, recyclable usage of consumables.
   

  

 By promoting recycling, fostering green procurement, reducing waste and exceeding regulatory requirements whenever possible, we aim to minimize our impact on the environment.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As a Software Engineer, you will play a critical role in further enhancing our technology innovations and take them to the next level.
   

  

 You will play a pivotal role in building Fountains next\\-generation on MicroServices platform which will power big retail chains in the future.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Adapt to a dynamic work environment.
* Stay updated with the latest in technology and always think about the customer first.
* Study and understand the product specifications thoroughly to design appropriate software solutions.
* Suggest improvements and optimize existing implementations.
* Learn new technologies for solving interesting business problems on the go.
* Develop code using industry best practices with good me and space complexities wherever applicable.
* Your code should be readable and easily understandable by your peers.
* Perform Code Reviews and suggest improvements.
* Develop JUnit test cases with good code coverage.
* Work with leading technologies like IoT, SpringFramework, AWS Lambda, AWS API Gateway, MySQL, AWS CloudFormation, AWS DynamoDB, AWS Elas Cache, Git, Jira and Jenkins among many others.
* Work with independence and show ownership of tasks.
* Create a good environment in your team, guide and mentor other members.


**Requirements**
* Good understanding of Data Structure and Algorithms.
* Sound understanding of previous work and the technologies used.
* You should have good hands\\-on programming experience with Java / JEE \\+ Microservices
* Exposure to the Spring / Spring Boot framework is an advantage.
* Hands on experience in Database querying either using SQL
* Thorough understanding of OOPs and OOAD.
* Good knowledge of design pa erns and their applications to appropriate requirements.
* You should be able to take ownership, design, develop and deploy in a collaborative environment with other team members
* Exposure to handling B2B integration is an advantage.
* 0\\-2 years of experience

description:
**Job Description**
 Our story
   

  

 At Alight Solutions, we believe a company's success starts with its people. At our core, we Champion People, help our colleagues Grow with Purpose and true to our name we encourage colleagues to "Be Alight."
   

  

**Our Values**
 Champion People \\- be empathetic and help create a place where everyone belongs.
   

  

 Grow with purpose \\- Be inspired by our higher calling of improving lives.
   

  

 Be Alight \\- act with integrity, be real and empower others.
   

  

 It's why we're so driven to connect passion with purpose. Alight helps clients gain a benefits advantage while building a healthy and financially secure workforce by unifying the benefits ecosystem across health, wealth, wellbeing, absence management and navigation.
   

  

 With a comprehensive total rewards package, continuing education and training, and tremendous potential with a growing global organization, Alight is the perfect place to put your passion to work.
   

  

 Join our team if you Champion People, want to Grow with Purpose through acting with integrity and if you embody the meaning of Be Alight.
   

  

 Learn more at
   

  

**Application Support Software Engineer** 
 will handle Tickets \\& Incidents raised by end\\-users of the application. This role primarily troubleshoots and resolves errors and log details in tickets for reference. They act quickly to analyze available data and find the root cause of issues. They provide solutions either themselves or pass the problem along to other engineering teams and provide users with progress updates.
   

  

**About The Company**
 Alight Solutions is a leading provider of integrated benefits, payroll, and human resources solutions. We are committed to transforming the way organizations manage their workforce and benefits programs. Our innovative approach combines technology, data\\-driven insights, and personalized support to deliver exceptional value to our clients and their employees. With a global presence and a focus on continuous improvement, Alight Solutions strives to create a positive impact on the lives of millions of people worldwide.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an Application Support Software Engineer at Alight Solutions, you will play a critical role in maintaining the stability and performance of our enterprise applications. Your primary responsibility will be to handle and resolve support tickets and incidents raised by end\\-users, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations. You will troubleshoot application errors, analyze logs, and identify root causes using various monitoring and diagnostic tools. Collaborating closely with development, infrastructure, and product teams, you will contribute to continuous improvement initiatives and help implement quick fixes to ensure seamless service delivery. Your expertise will support pre\\-launch testing, training, and documentation efforts, reinforcing our commitment to exceptional client service and operational excellence.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, or a related technical field. A minimum of 2 years of experience in application development or support is required. Demonstrated proficiency in SQL queries and stored procedures, core Java (JDK 11 or above), and familiarity with frameworks such as Wicket, Struts, J2EE (JSP, Servlets), and Spring Boot is essential. Experience with microservices architecture, REST APIs, and relational databases like SQL Server will be highly valued. Knowledge of cloud platforms, particularly AWS Cloud Services, is preferred. Additionally, familiarity with front\\-end technologies such as Angular is advantageous. Strong analytical skills, excellent communication, and the ability to work independently or collaboratively in fast\\-paced environments are critical for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Handle and resolve support tickets and incidents raised by end\\-users of enterprise applications promptly and effectively.
* Troubleshoot application errors, analyze logs, and identify root causes utilizing tools such as New Relic, Dynatrace, Kibana, and CloudWatch.
* Review source code to debug issues reported by clients and suggest fixes or improvements to the product team.
* Run database queries to verify configurations and data integrity, ensuring optimal application performance.
* Implement emergency fixes approved by technical leads to maintain business continuity during critical incidents.
* Provide timely updates and solutions to end\\-users or escalate issues to engineering teams when necessary.
* Support system failure diagnostics and assist in pre\\-live product implementations to ensure readiness.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including Product, Development, Infrastructure, and Design to resolve issues and enhance serviceability.
* Participate in engineering meetings to share feedback and contribute to service improvements.
* Assist customers during testing, training, and documentation phases of new product deployments.
* Create and distribute technical memos, service bulletins, and training materials for product upgrades and enhancements.
* Provide global technical support to client delivery teams via ticketing systems, email, or in\\-person interactions.
* Stay updated with new features and products through continuous learning and training.
* Be flexible to work in rotational shifts, including weekends or holidays as required to support 24/7 operations.


**Benefits**
 At Alight Solutions, we prioritize the well\\-being of our employees by offering comprehensive programs that support mental, physical, financial, and overall health. Our benefits include a variety of health coverage options, wellbeing and support programs, retirement plans, paid vacation and sick leave, maternity, paternity, and adoption leave, as well as opportunities for continuing education and professional development. Additionally, we offer voluntary benefits that cater to diverse needs, ensuring our team members feel valued and

title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
description:
**About Us**
 With electric vehicles expected to be nearly 30% of new vehicle sales by 2025 and more than 50% by 2040, electric mobility is becoming a reality. ChargePoint (NYSE: CHPT) is at the center of this revolution, powering one of the world‚Äôs leading EV charging networks and a comprehensive set of hardware, software and mobile solutions for every charging need across North America and Europe. We bring together drivers, businesses, automakers, policymakers, utilities and other stakeholders to make e\\-mobility a global reality.
   

  

 Since our founding in 2007, ChargePoint has focused solely on making the transition to electric easy for businesses, fleets and drivers. ChargePoint offers a once\\-in\\-a\\-lifetime opportunity to create an all\\-electric future and a trillion\\-dollar market.
   

  

 At ChargePoint, we foster a positive and productive work environment by committing to live our values of Be Courageous, Charge Together, Love our Customers, Operate with Openness, and Relentlessly Pursue Awesome. These values guide how we show up every day, align, and work together to build a brighter future for all of us.
   

  

 Join the team that is building the EV charging industry and make your mark on how people and goods will get everywhere they need to go, in any context, for generations to come.
   

  

 Reports To
   

  

 Senior Software Engineering Manager
   

  

 What You Will Be Doing
   

  

 We are building the digital backbone for electric vehicle charging network in North America and beyond‚Äîmaking it seamless, intelligent, and accessible. As a
 **Senior Android Engineer** 
 , you‚Äôll play a key role in delivering intuitive, high\\-performance mobile experiences that empower EV drivers to locate chargers, start sessions, track usage, and manage their vehicles on the go.
   

  

 If you‚Äôre passionate about sustainability, love building reliable Android apps, and want your work to have real\\-world impact‚Äîthis role is for you.
   

  

 What You Will Bring to ChargePoint
   

  

* Design and develop advanced Android features across the charging experience‚Äîstation discovery, real\\-time session tracking, payments, and notifications
* Work with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin, and modern Android patterns (MVVM/MVI) to deliver maintainable and scalable code
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to turn user needs into elegant solutions
* Ensure code quality through automated tests, peer reviews, and continuous integration
* Optimize app performance, battery usage, and real\\-time responsiveness for EV workflows
* Contribute to architectural decisions and help break down complex features into modular components
* Investigate and resolve production issues quickly and effectively
* Stay updated with the latest Android trends and apply best practices to deliver a world\\-class app


**Requirements**
* 5\\+ years of Android development experience with strong proficiency in Kotlin
* Experience building and scaling production apps with Jetpack libraries (e.g., Compose, Navigation, WorkManager)
* Strong understanding of mobile architecture (MVVM, MVI, Clean Architecture)
* Familiarity with REST APIs, JSON, and third\\-party integrations
* Experience working on location\\-based services, maps, or real\\-time data sync is a plus
* Comfortable with tools like Git, CI/CD systems, and performance profiling
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and a collaborative, product\\-first mindset


**Bonus Points**
* Experience in EV, mobility, IoT, or energy tech domains
* Knowledge of Bluetooth (BLE), RFID, or vehicle telematics
* Familiarity with analytics tools (Firebase, Amplitude, Segment)
* Exposure to modular app development or multi\\-module architecture
* Prior contributions to open\\-source Android libraries or technical blogs


**Tech Stack**
* Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, Hilt
* Google Maps SDK, Retrofit, Room, WebSockets
* Firebase (Crashlytics, Remote Config, A/B Testing)
* GitHub Actions, Bitrise (CI/CD)


**Location**
 Bangalore, India
   

  

 We are committed to an inclusive and diverse team. ChargePoint is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, color, ethnicity, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, marital status or any legally protected status.

title: Interesting Job Opportunity: GCS Design & Integration Engineer
description:
**Description :** 
 GCS Design and Integration Engineer
   

  

**Job Description :** 
 GCS Design and Integration Engineer
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated GCS Design and Integration Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and integrating Ground Control Station (GCS) software and systems with drones, ensuring robust communication, efficient operations, and seamless integration within the UAV ecosystem.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and integrate GCS software solutions for UAV systems.
* Collaborate with hardware and software teams to ensure seamless integration of GCS with drone platforms.
* Work with autopilot systems (PX4/ArduPilot) and implement MAVLink communication protocols.
* Develop, optimize, and maintain user interfaces for GCS applications using frameworks such as Qt.
* Conduct simulation testing using tools like Gazebo and ensure robust system validation.
* Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues related to communication protocols, sensors, and hardware components.
* Contribute to the development of backend systems, ensuring scalability and reliability.
* Prepare technical documentation, test plans, and integration reports.


**Qualifications \\& Skills**
* Education : Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Robotics, or a related technical field.
* Programming : Proficiency in languages such as C\\+\\+, Java, or Python for application development and backend systems.
* GCS \\& Drone Ecosystem : Experience with GCS software like QGroundControl, strong understanding of ArduPilot/PX4 autopilot ecosystem, and knowledge of the MAVLink protocol.
* Technical Expertise : Familiarity with drone hardware components, sensors, communication protocols, and drone development tools.
* Full\\-Stack Development : Experience with full\\-stack development, including GUI development with frameworks like Qt.
* Testing Tools : Experience with build management tools like CMake and simulation environments like Gazebo.
* Soft Skills : Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and effective communication skills.

title: Accolite - Senior Quality Assurance Engineer - Automation Testing
description:
**Description**
**About the job :**
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, modify, and maintain automated test scripts and frameworks using Python.
* Define and establish automation criteria, standards, and best practices aligned with industry benchmarks and organizational needs.
* Develop and mature automation frameworks for end\\-to\\-end and integration testing to improve execution speed, scalability, accessibility, and flexibility.
* Build and maintain advanced automated test suites across multiple platforms, environments, and releases.
* Design, configure, and maintain complex QA and test automation environments for UI and non\\-UI testing.
* Develop and implement effective testing strategies and automation techniques to validate application functionality.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to support product delivery schedules through planning, execution, and reporting of automated test suites.
* Establish and manage automated test environments for complex, multi\\-tier systems.
* Identify, analyze, document, and track defects, inconsistencies, and risks across application functionality, data, UI, content, and security.
* Partner closely with development teams to resolve automation and programming inconsistencies and identify opportunities to improve test coverage and automation effectiveness.
* Analyze and decompose complex software systems and design comprehensive automation strategies.
* Mentor and coach Test Automation Engineers I \\& II and train QA analysts on framework usage, script execution, and defect investigation.
* Measure, track, and report automation efficiency, coverage, and quality metrics using reporting and analytics tools.
* Gather technical requirements from internal stakeholders and provide informed recommendations for automation solutions.
* Engineer solutions to collect, analyze, and report test results using metrics and reporting platforms.
* Stay current with emerging technologies, tools, trends, and best practices in test automation.
* Provide guidance and support to employees, vendors, and stakeholders on automation processes, tools, and standards.
* Deliver high\\-quality work in a timely manner while maintaining a strong customer\\-service focus.
* Perform other related duties as Minimum 5 years of progressive Quality Assurance experience, including at least 4 years of automated testing experience.
* Strong experience with automation frameworks, tools, and scripting, preferably using Python.
* Solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), including participation in QA reviews and validation of requirements and specifications.
* Hands\\-on experience with automation tools and technologies such as Selenium, HP UFT, SoapUI, HP ALM, DVO, or equivalent.
* Proficiency in SQL and database technologies for test data setup, validation, and troubleshooting.
* Experience with client\\-side and web technologies including HTTP, HTML, Java, and JavaScript.
* Working knowledge of developer and CI/CD tools, but not limited to Git, Jenkins, Eclipse, Subversion, or similar.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with the ability to provide detailed technical analysis and root\\-cause investigations.
* Experience testing complex, multi\\-tier, web\\-based systems and data\\-driven applications.
* Working knowledge of QA methodologies, testing techniques, and risk\\-based testing approaches.
* Experience with cloud\\-based applications is preferred.
* Prior experience working in Agile/Scrum environments is preferred.
* Exposure to project management practices is a plus.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to clearly present complex technical concepts.
* Ability to work independently, manage competing priorities, meet deadlines, and perform effectively under pressure.
* Strong customer\\-service orientation with a positive, solution\\-focused attitude.
* Demonstrated organizational, troubleshooting, and adaptability skills.
* Commitment to maintaining confidentiality, professionalism, and Company values.


**Educational Requirements**
* Bachelors degree in Computer Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* ISTQB or CSTE Foundation Certification preferred.


**Desired Skills And Experience**
* QA Automation, Python, Selenium

title: Software Engineer III- QA and Test Automation
description:
**Job Description**
 We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Commercial \\& Investment Bank, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm‚Äôs business objectives
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Review business requirements and use BDD to create clear, testable scenarios.
* Collaborate with Product Owners, UX Designers, Developers, and global teams.
* Build, automate, and integrate test suites‚Äîincluding API tests‚Äîinto CI/CD pipelines.
* Use cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) for testing and deployment.
* Perform manual and exploratory testing to complement automation.
* Use Git for code reviews, branching, and tracking code quality.
* Track and report bugs clearly using tools like JIRA.
* Prioritize and run regression tests based on risk.
* Read application code to help with debugging and writing tests.
* Foster excellence, innovation, and ongoing improvement in quality assurance practices.


**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 3\\+ years applied experience
* Hands\\-on practical experience in system design, application development, testing, and operational stability
* Proficient in automation frameworks (Selenium, Playwright) and scripting languages (Python, Java, JavaScript).
* Experience in developing, debugging, and maintaining code in a large corporate environment with one or more modern programming languages and database querying languages.
* Experience in working with CI/CD pipelines such as AWS CodePipeline and Jenkins.
* Overall knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle.
* Demonstrated knowledge of software applications and technical processes within a technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, machine learning, mobile, etc.)


**Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Familiarity with modern front\\-end technologies
* ISEB or ISTQB certification.

title: ServiceNow - Lead Engineer
description:
**Overview**
* Consider dependencies, relationships, and integration points to ensure proper solution integration with other systems when applicable.
* Effectively manage and execute high level tasks assigned via 'stories.'
* Assists junior analysts through project(s) lifecycles.
* Manages work against an often\\-demanding timeline
* Communicates professionally and effectively, through verbal and non\\-verbal methods with business professionals and clients daily
* System integration experience using web services and other web\\-based technologies such as XML, HTML, AJAX, CSS, HTTP, REST/SOAP
* Flexible and has the ability to manage multiple projects concurrently
* Deep functional and technical knowledge of the ServiceNow and demonstrable experience with ServiceNow platform navigation, administration, configuration, and scripting
* Understanding of ITIL concepts and IT Service Management practices (ITIL v3 certification a plus)
* Understanding of Agile based approach to software development (SCRUM experience a plus)

**Responsibilities**

* Should know the offerings available with ServiceNow ITOM Suite as well as CMDB.
